mapper.select: SELECT par_id ,par_name ,filesystem FROM partition_info WHERE evd_id = #{evd_id} order by par_name asc

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM file_info a, partition_info b WHERE 1=1
AND a.parent_id = #{id}
AND b.evd_id = #{evd_id} AND (a.dir_type = 3 OR a.dir_type = 5)
AND b.par_id = #{par_id}
AND a.par_id = b.par_id
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT(#{search_fname}, '%')
AND a.size >= #{search_ssize}
AND a.size <= #{search_esize}
AND a.mtime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_stime})
AND a.mtime <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_etime})
AND a.ctime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_stime})
AND a.ctime <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_etime})
AND a.atime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_stime})
AND a.atime <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{search_etime})

select FROM_UNIXTIME(fn_mtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as name, count(*) as value from ( with recursive cte (file_id, name, parent_id, dir_type, fn_mtime) as ( select file_id, name, parent_id, dir_type, fn_mtime from file_info where parent_id = #{id} union all select p.file_id, p.name, p.parent_id, p.dir_type, p.fn_mtime from file_info p inner join cte on p.parent_id = cte.file_id ) select * from cte ) a group by FROM_UNIXTIME(fn_mtime, '%Y-%m-%d')
